Rules.Description: A rule giving user with role REGNA, A0237, A0238, A0239, A0240, SISKD or KNUF and the app owner skd the right to instantiate a instance of a given app of skd/mva-melding-innsending-v1
Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0237
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0238
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0240
urn:altinn:rolecode:SISKD
urn:altinn:rolecode:KNUF
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0239
urn:altinn:org:skd

Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role REGNA, A0237, A0238, A0239, A0240, SISKD or KNUF can read for skd/mva-melding-innsending-v1 in any task or event
Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0237
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0238
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0240
urn:altinn:rolecode:SISKD
urn:altinn:rolecode:KNUF
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0239

Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role REGNA, A0237, A0238, A0239, A0240, SISKD or KNUF can write and delete for skd/mva-melding-innsending-v1 when it is in Task_1
Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0237
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0238
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0240
urn:altinn:rolecode:SISKD
urn:altinn:rolecode:KNUF
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0239

Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role SISKD, KNUF, A0239 can write, confirm and delete for skd/mva-melding-innsending-v1 when it is in Task_2
Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:SISKD
urn:altinn:rolecode:KNUF
urn:altinn:rolecode:A0239

Rules.Description: Rule that defines that skd can delete, write or confirm an instance of skd/mva-melding-innsending-v1 in any task or event.
Subject: urn:altinn:org:skd

Rules.Description: Rule that defines that skd can complete an instance of mva-melding-innsending-v1 which state is at the end event.
Subject: urn:altinn:org:skd
